participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

bpm_1_y.Description: I act too young for my age | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_2_y.Description: I argue a lot | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_3_y.Description: I fail to finish things I start | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_4_y.Description: I have trouble concentrating or paying attention | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_5_y.Description: I have trouble sitting still | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_6_y.Description: I destroy things belonging to others | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_7_y.Description: I disobey my parents | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_8_y.Description: I disobey at school. (Interviewer: Please select "Not True" when participant is not in school at the time of the assessment.) | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_9_y.Description: I feel worthless or inferior  Definition of inferior: less good | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_10_y.Description: I act without stopping to think | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_11_y.Description: I am too fearful or anxious | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_12_y.Description: I feel too guilty | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_13_y.Description: I am self-conscious or easily embarrassed | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_14_y.Description: I am inattentive or easily distracted | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_15_y.Description: I am stubborn | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_16_y.Description: I have a hot temper  Definition of "hot temper": bad temper, get mad easily | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_17_y.Description: I threaten to hurt people | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_18_y.Description: I am unhappy, sad, or depressed | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_19_y.Description: I worry a lot | 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

bpm_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event-name] = 3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1''''

bpm_y_scr_attention_r.Description: Raw Score: bpm_1_y plus bpm_3_y plus bpm_4_y plus bpm_5_y plus bpm_10_y plus bpm_14_y; Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_scr_attention_t.Description: T-Score | T scores are based on the "r" score and the sex at birth (male or female) of the child

bpm_y_ss_attention_mean.Description: Mean Score: Mean(bpm_1_y plus bpm_3_y plus bpm_4_y plus bpm_5_y plus bpm_10_y plus bpm_14_y); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_scr_internal_r.Description: Raw Score: bpm_9_y plus bpm_11_y plus bpm_12_y plus bpm_13_y plus bpm_18_y plus bpm_19_y Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_ss_internal_mean.Description: Mean Score: Mean(bpm_9_y plus bpm_11_y plus bpm_12_y plus bpm_13_y plus bpm_18_y plus bpm_19_y) Validation: Minimum of 4 items must be answered

bpm_y_scr_external_r.Description: Raw Score: bpm_2_y plus bpm_6_y plus bpm_7_y plus bpm_8_y plus bpm_15_y plus bpm_16_y plus bpm_17_y; Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_ss_external_mean.Description: Mean Score: Mean(bpm_2_y plus bpm_6_y plus bpm_7_y plus bpm_8_y plus bpm_15_y plus bpm_16_y plus bpm_17_y); Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_scr_totalprob_r.Description: Raw Score: bpm_1_y plus bpm_2_y plus bpm_3_y plus bpm_4_y plus bpm_5_y plus bpm_6_y plus bpm_7_y plus bpm_8_y plus bpm_9_y plus bpm_10_y plus bpm_11_y plus bpm_12_y plus bpm_13_y plus bpm_14_y plus bpm_15_y plus bpm_16_y plus bpm_17_y plus bpm_18_y plus bpm_19_y; Validation: All items must be answered

bpm_y_ss_totalprob_mean.Description: Mean: Mean(bpm_1_y plus bpm_2_y plus bpm_3_y plus bpm_4_y plus bpm_5_y plus bpm_6_y plus bpm_7_y plus bpm_8_y plus bpm_9_y plus bpm_10_y plus bpm_11_y plus bpm_12_y plus bpm_13_y plus bpm_14_y plus bpm_15_y plus bpm_16_y plus bpm_17_y plus bpm_18_y plus bpm_19_y); Validation: All items must be answered
